course_name: Introduction to Computer Programming in Python
course_description:
Introduction to computer programming and to problem solving techniques using computer programs; programming lab experience.
Prereq: Math 1130, 1140, 1149, 1150, or 1151, or Math Placement Level L.
course_prerequisites: Prereq: Math 1130, 1140, 1149, 1150, or 1151, or Math Placement Level L.
